title: 5 Kashmiris killed by Indian forces in Kulgam
text:
5 Kashmiris killed by Indian forces in Kulgam | Kashmir is the bone of contention between India-Pakistan: FO 
Five Kashmiris were killed in occupied Kashmir by Indian troops in Kulgam district early in the morning on Sunday. 
While speaking to Kashmir Media Service, DIG Vijay Kumar confirmed the killing of four youth during the operation launched jointly by the Indian army and the paramilitary Central Reserve Police Force in Frisal. 
Two of the four martyred youth have been identified as Zubair Ahmas Butt of Nowpora and Ashfaq Ahmad of Shopian. 
According to Kumar, bodies of the youth were recovered from the debris of a house where the youth were staying. 
“The operation in Kulgam is still under way,” said an official of the Indian army. 
"The killings took place during the joint operation," confirmed an official of the Kulgam police. 
However, according to the Indian media, it was an encounter in Nowpora area of Frisal in Kulgam district which claimed the lives of two Indian soldiers. 0 0 5 Kashmiris killed by Indian forces in Kulgam was posted in world of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 12, 2017 and was last updated on February 12, 2017. This news story is related to Geo News, Latest News, Kashmiris Killed, Indian Soldiers Killed, Encounter, Operation, Frisal, Kulgam.
